text: Lovre Miloš (born 5 April 1994) is a Croatian water polo player for HAVK Mladost and the Croatian national team. He participated at the 2019 World Championships. ==See also== * List of World Aquatics Championships medalists in water polo ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian male water polo players Category:World Aquatics Championships medalists in water polo
title: Lovre Miloš
